title: Publisher Rocket Tutorial | The Complete 2025 Guide With NEW Tool!

tactics.name: Keyword Search Analysis
tactics.description: Use Publisher Rocket's keyword search to identify profitable niches by analyzing competition, pricing, and search volume.
steps: Analyze columns like competitive score, average price, and monthly earnings
Click magnifying glass for deeper keyword research
caveats: May miss long-tail keywords without manual filtering
source_quotes: Publisher Rocket will give us some core data...create a book

tactics.name: Competition Analyzer
tactics.description: Evaluate competitor books using Publisher Rocket's competition analyzer to assess pricing, sales, and keyword usage.
steps: Input keywords to retrieve competing books
Analyze BSR, daily sales, and keyword targeting
Compare cover designs and category trends
caveats: Requires accurate ISBN/ASIN input for precise data
source_quotes: we can scroll down here and we can see all the books are listed so far on the search results of Amazon

tactics.name: Competitor Analysis
tactics.description: Use Publisher Rocket to analyze competitor books' BSR rankings, review counts, and category placements
steps: Search keywords via Rocket's keyword tool
Transition to category search from keyword results
Identify top-performing books with low page counts
Check category placements and publisher distribution
caveats: Ghost categories may require manual verification

tactics.name: Category Optimization
tactics.description: Leverage Rocket's category search to identify high-potential Amazon categories
steps: Use keyword search to find relevant books
Transition to category search for category insights
Analyze category growth rates and publisher dominance

tactics.name: Category Search for Growth
tactics.description: Use Publisher Rocket to identify categories with increasing sales and low competition.
steps: Search for categories using keyword filters
Check sales growth metrics and publisher data
Select categories with 4-5x sales growth potential
caveats: Categories with high publisher saturation may require more effort
source_quotes: this category has a high variation only a few best sellers might be driving its growth

heuristics.name: Competitive Score Filter
heuristics.condition: If competitive score is green (low competition) and BSR < 50,000, prioritize niche
source_quotes: Green is what we're looking for...competitive score of a green

heuristics.name: Page One Click Advantage
heuristics.condition: If a book ranks on page one, it receives 270 clicks vs 60 clicks for page six results
source_quotes: statistically speaking 270 people will click on the book that shows up at the top

heuristics.name: Review Threshold
heuristics.condition: If median reviews are below 200, prioritize content optimization
source_quotes: this book here... only 26 pages... ranking right now

heuristics.name: Low Competition Targeting
heuristics.condition: If a category shows 4+ sales growth with <200 reviews, prioritize it
source_quotes: expect low competition making it easy to rank as a bestseller

claims.statement: Publisher Rocket offers a $197 free course with affiliate link
source_quotes: you get the exclusive $197 12-hour course absolutely free

claims.statement: Books on page one of Amazon search results receive significantly more clicks than those on subsequent pages.
source_quotes: if people were to type in life skills for teens... 270 people will click on the book that shows up at the top

claims.statement: Amazon has over 12,000 categories and subcategories
source_quotes: there are over 12,000 categories and subcategories on Amazon

claims.statement: 52% of Publishers in parenting/relationships categories use Kindle Unlimited

niche_patterns.description: Identify underserved niches with specific audience constraints
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Balances demand with low competition and pricing potential
